parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Status of the opportunities. Valid values are open and closed.

parameter.name: tag
parameter.description: Tagged with the specified tag for opportunities.

parameter.name: lastModified
parameter.description: Added or updated since the date specified.

parameter.name: start
parameter.description: First record to be returned. The results start with an index of 0.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: The maximum number of matching records to be returned.
